name: Timmy (bobbobderson)
description:
Timmy must make his way through abstract levels to get to the portal.

Timmy has no idea what to do.

Fortunately, you are controlling him! 

You can also change the size of the world Timmy lives in.

So go do it!

CONTROLS:

A/D - Move

W/Spacebar - Jump

Shift - Dash

Ctrl - Precision mode

R - Restart level

-/+ - Change world size

Made for the GDL - July 2021 Jam.
